#summary List of devices that were tested with SmartCard API support

Android is running on different devices from different manufacturers. This overview should list the devices and configuration that was tested successfully with !SmartCard API support.<br/>

====!SmartCard API====
The following devices were tested with _!SmartCard API extensions_ according to [BuildingTheSystem Building the System]

||  || *Android 1.6 (donut)* || *Android 2.2 (froyo)* || *Android 2.3 (gingerbread)* || *Android 4.0 (ics)* ||
|| ADP1 / Dream || + || - || - || - ||
|| ADP2 / Sapphire || + || + || - || - ||
|| Nexus One (passion) || - || + || + || - ||
|| Nexus S (crespo) || - || - || + || + ||
|| Galaxy Nexus (maguro) || - || - || + || + ||
|| Xoom (wingray) || - || - || + || + ||

_note.1_: The Nexus S and Galaxy Nexus was obviously not tested with the Mobile Security Card (_!MscTerminal_) but with a _!DummyTerminal_ as it lacks MicroSD support.

Please help by providing feedback regarding the installable _MSC !SmartcardService.apk_ on different devices we could not test!

_note.1_: Applications using the OpenMobileAPI methods are not working as a version of !SmartCard API is already integrated in the system framework that does not support all OpenMobileAPI functionality yet. Applications using the android.smartcard interface work without problems.
